sentences.english: Promoted to Year 2 of Higher Diploma in Human Resource Management, Tsing Yi Campus.
sentences.chinese: 升读青衣分校人力资源管理学高级文凭课程二年级。

sentences.english: Kelli Kirk is a writer, baker, mom and human resources manager.
sentences.chinese: 凯利柯克是一位作家，面包师，妈妈和人力资源经理。

sentences.english: Therefore, HR becomes a kind of pass-through in the information cycle.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人力资源人员在信息循环中承担传递的角色。

sentences.english: In addition, Wal-Mart China Human Resources Senior Vice President Wang Yujia resigns.
sentences.chinese: 此外，沃尔玛中国人力资源高级副总裁王渝佳已辞职。

sentences.english: The Municipal Department of human resources protection shall complete the examination within 10 working days.
sentences.chinese: 市人力资源保障部门应当在10个工作日内完成审核。

sentences.english: How do internal processes and human resources work together to achieve the goals?
sentences.chinese: 内部流程和人力资源是如何一起工作来达到目标的呢？

sentences.english: These three problems are the aggregate demand, construction and fluxion Yantai Food-Industry System's human resources.
sentences.chinese: 烟台食品工业系统人力资源的流动问题。

sentences.english: Sixth, talents market project, developing human resources diversely .
sentences.chinese: 六是人才强市工程，多方位开发人力资源。

sentences.english: For all types of enterprises to provide high-quality human resources services.
sentences.chinese: 为各类企业提供优质的人力资源服务。

sentences.english: Second, the college should construct education management system aiming at developing human resource of students.
sentences.chinese: 建立以开发学生人力资源为核心的教育管理系统。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on overcoming the supply chain issues associated with human resources.
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章关注于克服供应链联合人力资源的问题。

sentences.english: I am requested to submit a regulation report to the HRD every week.
sentences.chinese: 我需要每周向人力资源总监提交工作报告。

sentences.english: Shenzhen boasts a developed economy, well-grounded infrastructure and abundant human resources.
sentences.chinese: 深圳经济发达，基础设施完备，人力资源丰富。

sentences.english: The human resources are available on the day shift only on weekdays.
sentences.chinese: 只有在工作日的白班才有人力资源可用。

sentences.english: Put forward the comparatively systematic policy recommendations of the resources-type city's human resources development.
sentences.chinese: 提出了较为系统的资源型城市人力资源开发政策建议。

sentences.english: Performance appraising is the key and basis of developing and managing human resources.
sentences.chinese: 绩效考核是人力资源开发与管理的关键和基础。

definition: abbr. of 人力資源|人力资源[ren2 li4 zi1 yuan2]
informatization (the Information Age analog of industrialization)
